mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(name, email, encrypted_password, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update users set name = #{name}, email = #{email}, encrypted_password = #{password} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select *, encrypted_password as password from users
select *, encrypted_password as password from users u where u.id = #{id}
select count(1) from users u where u.name = #{name}
